qas.question: Where was Beyoncé's first public performance after giving birth?
How many nights did Beyoncé play at the resort?

context: On <a0_0><a4_0><a8_0>January 7, 2012<a8_0/><a4_0/><a0_0/>, Beyoncé gave birth to her first child, a daughter, <a2_0><a5_0><a9_0>Blue Ivy Carter<a9_0/><a5_0/><a2_0/>, at <a1_0><a10_0>Lenox Hill Hospital<a1_0/> in New York.<a10_0/> <a6_0>Five months<a6_0/> later, she performed for <a7_0><a12_0>four<a12_0/> nights<a7_0/> at <a3_0><a11_0>Revel Atlantic City's Ovation Hall<a11_0/><a3_0/> to celebrate the resort's opening, her first performances since giving birth to Blue Ivy.
